name: Laser fish
description:
Controls:

  • Left mouse button: move towards mouse
  • Right mouse button: charge weapon (you have to stay still while charging), and release to fire laser.

The game was made in 48 hours for the Kenney game jam.

The game is loosely based on the theme of the game jam "its a feature, not a bug", as the main mechanic (having to stand still to fire) was at first just a bug, but after a few hours of polish it no longer resembles a bug.

Sprite packs used in the game: Abstract platformer, Alien ufo-pack, Space shooter, UI pack fixed and puzzle pack.
